name: Smokepoint
0:
”Alexa, ask Smokepoint what is the smoke point of canola oil?”
”Alexa, ask Smokepoint of lard”
”give me the smoke point of extra-virgin olive oil”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smoke point
des: Provide an oil or similar cooking substance, and this skill will tell you its smoke point!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
